verses.verse: In you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, do I put my trust <S%H2620><s%>: let me never <S%H408><s%> be put to confusion <S%H954><s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me in your righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and cause me to escape <S%H6403><s%>: incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> unto me <S%H3467><s%>, and save me.

Be you my strong <S%H6697><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>, unto what I may continually <S%H8548><s%> resort <S%H935><s%>: you have given commandment <S%H6680><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H5553><s%>; for you are my rock and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>.
Deliver <S%H6403><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O my God, out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the unrighteous <S%H5765><s%> and cruel man <S%H2556><s%>.
For you are my hope <S%H8615><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>: you are my trust <S%H4009><s%> from my youth <S%H5271><s%>.

By you have I been held up <S%H5564><s%> from the womb <S%H990><s%>: you are he that took <S%H1491><s%> me out of my mother <S%H517><s%>'s bowels <S%H4578><s%>: my praise <S%H8416><s%> shall be continually of you <S%H8548><s%>.
I am as a wonder <S%H4159><s%> unto many <S%H7227><s%>; but you are my strong <S%H5797><s%> refuge <S%H4268><s%>.
Let my mouth <S%H6310><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with your praise <S%H8416><s%> and with your honor <S%H8597><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>.
Cast me not off <S%H7993><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of old age <S%H2209><s%>; forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not when my strength <S%H3581><s%> fails <S%H3615><s%>.
For my enemies <S%H341><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> against me <S%H8104><s%>; and they that lay wait for my soul <S%H5315><s%> take counsel <S%H3289><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>,
Saying <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> him <S%H7291><s%>: persecute and take <S%H8610><s%> him <S%H5337><s%>; for there is none to deliver him.
O God <S%H430><s%>, be not far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H430><s%>: O my God, make haste <S%H2363><s%> for my help <S%H5833><s%>.

Let them be confounded <S%H954><s%> and consumed <S%H3615><s%> that are adversaries <S%H7853><s%> to my soul <S%H5315><s%>; let them be covered <S%H5844><s%> with reproach <S%H2781><s%> and dishonor <S%H3639><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
But I will hope <S%H3176><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, and will yet praise <S%H8416><s%> you more <S%H3254><s%> and more <S%H3254><s%>.

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall show forth <S%H5608><s%> your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and your salvation <S%H8668><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>; for I know <S%H3045><s%> not the numbers there <S%H5615><s%>.
I will go in <S%H935><s%> the strength <S%H1369><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>: I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of your righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, even of your only.
O God <S%H430><s%>, you have taught <S%H3925><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%>: and until now have I declared <S%H5046><s%> your wondrous works <S%H6381><s%>.

Now also when <S%H5704><s%> I am old <S%H2209><s%> and grayheaded <S%H7872><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not <S%H5046><s%>; until I have showed your strength <S%H2220><s%> unto this generation <S%H1755><s%>, and your power <S%H1369><s%> to every one that is to come <S%H935><s%>.
Your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> also <S%H430><s%>, O God, is very high <S%H4791><s%>, who have done <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%>: O God <S%H430><s%>, who is like unto you

You <S%H7200><s%>, which have showed me great <S%H7227><s%> and severe <S%H7451><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%>, shall quicken <S%H2421><s%> me again <S%H7725><s%>, and shall bring me up <S%H5927><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H8415><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
You shall increase <S%H7235><s%> my greatness <S%H1420><s%>, and comfort <S%H5162><s%> me on every side <S%H5437><s%>.

I will also praise <S%H3034><s%> you with the psaltery <S%H3627><s%>, even your truth <S%H571><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>: unto you will I sing <S%H2167><s%> with the harp <S%H3658><s%>, O you Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
My lips <S%H8193><s%> shall greatly rejoice <S%H7442><s%> when I sing <S%H2167><s%> unto you <S%H5315><s%>; and my soul, which you have redeemed <S%H6299><s%>.

My tongue <S%H3956><s%> also shall talk <S%H1897><s%> of your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H954><s%>: for they are confounded, for they are brought unto shame <S%H2659><s%>, that seek <S%H1245><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
